div.p: The base ecosystem model is described, and its parameters given, in: Kumar, R., Surma, S., Pitcher, T.J., Varkey, D., Lam, M., Ainsworth, C. and Pakhomov, E. (2016) An Ecosystem Model of the Ocean Around Haida Gwaii, Northern British Columbia: Ecopath, Ecosim and Ecospace. UBC Fisheries Centre Research Reports 24(2): 76pp. This report can be freely downloaded from: < http://oceans.ubc.ca/publications/research-reports/>. All other relevant data are within the paper and its Supporting Information files.
